article_text: Missouri lawmaker Rep. Paul Wieland fighting required birth control coverage in his state-sponsored insurance plan is relying on the U.S. Supreme Court’s recent Hobby Lobby ruling as he contests a lower court’s rejection of his legal challenge to the Affordable Care Act mandate.

article_metadata.title: Missouri lawmaker challenges Affordable Care Act’s birth control mandate | The Kansas City Star
